react-md-menus

parameter.name: include-media
parameter.description:
Boolean if the media queries are included
    for menus.

parameter.name: include-cascading
parameter.description:
Boolean if the desktop cascading
    styles for menus should be included.

usedBy.description:
Includes every component, transition, and typography including their
media queries if the `$md-media-included` variable is `true`. You can
modify any global variables before including this mixin to change the overall
theme.

context.name: react-md-everything

mixins.description:
Creates the styles for menus on mobile devices. This should _normally_
be used a media query.

usedBy.description: Includes the media queries for menus on mobile devices and desktop screens.

mixins.description:
Creates the styles for menus on desktop screens. This should _normally_
be used a media query.

usedBy.description: Includes the media queries for menus on mobile devices and desktop screens.

mixins.description: Includes the media queries for menus on mobile devices and desktop screens.
